hero.title: MaaEnd
hero.subtitle: MAA - End
hero.tagline: High-precision automation assistant. Designed for heavy-duty operations and maximum efficiency in Arknights: Endfield.

realTimeTask.title: Real-time Combat
realTimeTask.detail: Auto-fight, auto-pick, auto-zipline, and quick teleport. Handles story skipping, interaction guides, tutorials, and info panels automatically.

puzzleSolver.title: Puzzle Solver
puzzleSolver.detail: High-precision recognition and automated solving for various puzzles. Supports single, loop, and dry-run modes.

autoResell.title: Auto Resell
autoResell.detail: Smart profit recognition and automated trading strategies to maximize your commercial gains.

blueprints.title: Blueprint Import
blueprints.detail: One-click import for building blueprints, quickly constructing complex industrial production lines.

dailyRewards.title: Daily Automation
dailyRewards.detail: Auto-claim daily rewards, read Wiki, receive production manual rewards, and complete Baker Entry tasks.

crossPlatform.title: Cross Platform
crossPlatform.detail: Full support for Windows (Win32 API) and Android (ADB), compatible with various emulators and native environments.

about.paragraph1: MaaEnd is not just a scriptâ€”it's an intelligent automation platform built on next-generation image recognition technology. Through deep learning models and real-time decision algorithms, it thinks like a human player but with machine-like precision and stability.
about.paragraph2: Open source, secure, and transparent. MaaEnd is community-driven, providing reliable logistical support for administrators worldwide. Whether on high-performance Win32 native environments or ADB-driven mobile platforms, MaaEnd delivers a consistently excellent experience.

footer.marquee: LET'S AUTOMATE THE FUTURE OF ARKNIGHTS: ENDFIELD
footer.description: An advanced AI automation assistant for Endfield. Open source, secure, and highly efficient.
footer.copyright: MaaEnd TEAM. OPEN SOURCE UNDER AGPL-3.0.
footer.designGoalNote: The webpage content reflects the product design goals; AI priority refers to the module/project name.
